mapper.select: select id,bsc from RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA where AREA_ID = #{param1}

select distinct(to_char(t.mea_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')) mea_date from rno_gsm_eri_cell t,rno_gsm_eri_cell_desc d where t.ERI_CELL_DESC_ID = d.ID and t.mea_date >= add_months(sysdate,-40) and t.city_id=#{param1} and d.data_type=#{param2}
